Hero.title: Hi! I'm Javier Vega Molina
Hero.content: Software Developer with experience in creating scalable and modern applications

Skills.title: Services & Skills
Skills.content: I provide end-to-end solutions for web applications, from design and development to deployment, optimization, monitoring and ongoing maintenance. I help businesses improve their digital presence, build reliable systems, and launch fast, secure websites with custom domains and business email.

FrontEnd.title: Frontend Development
FrontEnd.content: Designing and building modern, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces optimized for all devices. I create fast, accessible, and pixel-perfect web experiences using the latest frontend technologies.

BackEnd.title: Backend Development
BackEnd.content: Developing secure, scalable, and high-performance server-side solutions. I build REST APIs, microservices, database architectures, background jobs (Cron, schedulers), and AI-powered features using modern backend frameworks.

Maintenance.title: Maintenance & Monitoring
Maintenance.content: Providing continuous support, bug fixing, performance optimization, and new feature development. I implement monitoring tools to keep your systems healthy, stable, and running efficiently.

SoftwareTest.title: Software Testing
SoftwareTest.content: Creating automated test suites, including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests. I also design stress and load testing scenarios to ensure system reliability at scale.

PerformanceDigitalPresence.title: Performance & Digital Presence
PerformanceDigitalPresence.content: Improving website speed, SEO ranking, accessibility, and conversion rates. I support business growth through technical SEO, analytics, marketing funnels, and lead-capture strategies.

WebHosting.title: Web Hosting
WebHosting.content: Setting up secure hosting solutions with custom domains, SSL certificates, DNS configurations, and business email accounts. Fully managed deployment and hosting for your website or application.

About.title: About
About.content: Get to know more about my background and skills

MainInfo.title: About me
MainInfo.content_1: I'm Javier Vega, a Software Engineer and Bachelor in Computer Science from ESPOL in Ecuador. I have 5 years of experience in tech and over 3 years specializing in professional Software Development.
MainInfo.content_2: My academic background in Algorithms, Data Structures, Databases, and System Design helps me build scalable and modern systems. I’ve delivered impactful solutions using TypeScript, Python, NestJS, FastAPI, Next.js, React, and Tailwind.
MainInfo.content_3: I currently work as a Software Developer at Telecu, a telecommunications company, where I build new features, maintain core systems, and deliver scalable backend services. My work includes writing high-quality code, implementing tests, and improving performance and reliability across our applications.

University.title: Bachelor in Computer Science
University.content: ESPOL - Escuela Superior Politécnica del Litoral

Bootcamp.title: Master's in Artificial Intelligence
Bootcamp.content: UEES - Universidad de Especialidades Espíritu Santo

Experiences.title: Experiences
Experiences.content: My professional journey building scalable systems, AI-powered products, and end-to-end web applications.

Experience_1.title: Semi-Senior Full-Stack Developer
Experience_1.subtitle: Telecu
Experience_1.content_1: Led full software development lifecycles from architecture to deployment, including mentoring a junior developer. (Node.js, TypeScript, Docker, PostgreSQL)
Experience_1.content_2: Architected and deployed a RAG-based chatbot that automated 30% of client inquiries. (Python, LangChain, FastAPI)
Experience_1.content_3: Built AI-powered voice bots and WhatsApp automation, increasing qualified leads by 15%.
Experience_1.content_4: Developed AI agents handling 500+ appointment bookings per month, reducing administrative workload by 20 hours/week.
Experience_1.content_5: Built a reporting system used by 50+ field technicians, improving daily completion rates by 20%. (React, NestJS, Grafana)
Experience_1.content_6: Integrated Paymentz, WHMCS, and Datil into a unified billing system, reducing invoice processing time by 85%.
Experience_1.content_7: Designed a fault-tolerant notification system ensuring 100% delivery reliability. (NestJS, RabbitMQ, PostgreSQL)

Experience_2.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
Experience_2.subtitle: Telecu
Experience_2.content_1: Developed backend and frontend features for internal platforms and client-facing applications. (Node.js, TypeScript, React, PostgreSQL)
Experience_2.content_2: Implemented REST APIs and microservices, improving system responsiveness and reliability.
Experience_2.content_3: Provided production support, resolving critical issues and improving platform stability.
Experience_2.content_4: Contributed to integrations with external providers including Paymentz, WHMCS, and Datil.

Experience_3.title: Software Engineer
Experience_3.subtitle: Prefectura del Guayas
Experience_3.content_1: Developed a tourism mobile application for the Guayas province using a modular microservices backend. (React Native, NestJS, Azure)
Experience_3.content_2: Improved tourism engagement — 90% of users reported feeling more motivated to visit after using the app.
Experience_3.content_3: Tech stack: React Native, NestJS, Microservices, Azure App Services

Experience_4.title: Full-Stack Developer
Experience_4.subtitle: Sipecom S.A.
Experience_4.content_1: Upgraded legacy PHP 5 systems to PHP 8.2, resolving security vulnerabilities and retaining a major client responsible for 60% of revenue.
Experience_4.content_2: Migrated on-premise applications to Azure Cloud, reducing infrastructure and maintenance costs by 70%. (Azure, Docker, Nginx)
Experience_4.content_3: Tech stack: PHP, MySQL, Azure, Docker, Nginx

Experience_5.title: Teaching Assistant — Programming Languages
Experience_5.subtitle: ESPOL Polytechnic University
Experience_5.content_1: Taught programming languages including PHP, Ruby, Dart, Python, JavaScript, and Clojure to students enrolled in the Programming Languages course.
Experience_5.content_2: Assisted students with assignments, debugging, functional programming concepts, and project development.
Experience_5.content_3: Skills applied: Python, Ruby, Dart, JavaScript, PHP, Clojure, Functional Programming

Experience_6.title: Frontend Web Developer (Internship)
Experience_6.subtitle: ZEDE del Litoral
Experience_6.content_1: Redesigned the company’s main website and implemented new features including a contact form and an image carousel.
Experience_6.content_2: Improved user experience and increased inbound client inquiries through a more modern, responsive interface.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.content: Explore some of my recent work. Includes work projects, freelancer and personal projects.

Project_1.title: ESPOL GPA Calculator
Project_1.description: ESPOL GPA Calculator is a simple tool to estimate your GPA based on the grades you enter. It lets you try different scenarios and understand your academic performance. Built to help ESPOL students track their progress quickly and easily.

Project_2.title: Zentinel Landing Page
Project_2.description: This landing page walks through the platform’s workflow, highlighting its key features, benefits, and use cases. It contains sections that explain visitor registration, enhanced security, and streamlined operations for communities and businesses. It also features screenshots, testimonials, and a clear call to action to help visitors get started and protect their premises today.

Project_3.title: Zentinel
Project_3.description: Zentinel is the modern access control solution for all types of facilities. With smart technology and a user-friendly interface, it simplifies visitor registration and management. Keep your community, company, or educational center secure and well-organized at all times.

Project_4.title: Hermes
Project_4.description: This app enables you to generate conversational phone calls powered by generative AI. It provides natural, personalized interactions in real time. Ideal for automating customer service, surveys, or virtual assistants.

Project_5.title: Electronic Services Portal: Daule
Project_5.description: A high-traffic frontend solution enabling digital governance for the Municipality of Daule, serving over 200,000 residents. Developed with React and TypeScript, the platform focuses on stability and accessibility. To ensure zero-failure reliability for critical public services, I implemented a rigorous E2E testing strategy with Cypress, achieving 95% code coverage integrated into a Jenkins CI/CD pipeline.

Project_6.title: Data Protection Law AI Assistant
Project_6.description: An advanced AI conversational agent designed to democratize access to Ecuador's Data Protection Law. Built with Python, LangChain, and OpenAI, it utilizes a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture to provide accurate, citation-backed legal guidance without hallucinations. Features include a semantic router for cost optimization, a vector database (ChromaDB) for document ingestion, and multi-channel access via a modern React web interface and WhatsApp.

Contact.title: Contact
